description: Decimal expansion of square root of 72.
comments: This is also the ratio of the volume of a cube to the volume of a regular tetrahedron of the same edge length. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, May 29 2002Continued fraction expansion is 8 followed by {2, 16} repeated. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 08 2009Decimal expansion of shortest length, (B), of segment from side BC through incenter to side BA in right triangle ABC with sidelengths (a,b,c)=(8,15,17), see A195284. - _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 14 2011Decimal expansion of shortest length, (B), of segment from side BC through incenter to side BA in right triangle ABC with sidelengths (a,b,c)=(7,24,25). - _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 14 2011
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=sqrt(72); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b010524.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 08 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
